transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji good good morning sir.
Executive: Good morning mam, main Abhishek baat kar raha hu mam IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan ji mam. Uh I think last time maine aapko bataya hua tha uh kuch products vagera add karne ke liye.
Customer: Haan ji sir, woh hamari jo dusri wali accountant hai woh join ho chuki hai. Aap ab unse join ho sakte hain.
Executive: Mam, achha. Actually last time aap hi se baat hua tha na mera?
Customer: Haan haan, mujhse baat hui thi lekin ab woh apne system pe aa gayi hain.
Executive: Achha, ek minute. Aap unka number de paoge kya?
Customer: Haan, main abhi unka number deti hu aapko.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega main aapko just ek minute. Main aapko WhatsApp pe pin kar deta hu. Yeh number WhatsApp pe hai nahi mera. Ek minute.
Customer: Theek hai. Main aapko bhej deti hu.
Executive: Haan aap bhej dijiye. Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Follow-up on adding products to the catalog.
- Informed that a new accountant is now handling the account.
- Requested the new accountant's contact number.


Resolution:

- Agreed to share the new accountant's contact number.
- Requested to send the number via WhatsApp.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Customer will send the new accountant's contact number to the executive.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- follow-up, product addition, contact sharing, accountant
